page.title: 20HOME LIFE+FAMILY LIFE
page.content: KATY YOUNGÂ£S WEEK Every day I get up at 7.15 to go to school.We do lessons till play-time, and play Â£tigÂ£orÂ£stick-in-the-mudÂ£. After dinner we do lessons again,then we say prayers,and go home. On Saturday,thereÂ£s no school,so I get up at 8.30 to watchÂ£Wide-AwakeÂ£.After breakfast,we go shopping.We have fish and chips for dinner,if the tide is not right.Then I have my piano lesson,and my sister has her riding lesson. On Sunday,we sometimes go out for the whole day,or we go to church in the morning,and play out for the rest of the day.We get our school stuff ready after tea,and have to go to bed early, so we can get up for school in the morning.
